column1: Smoque BBQ////Meat lovers unite! The brisket is so tender and juicy
column2: it will not disappoint. You can get a smaller portion of brisket on a roll (which is super soft by the way)
column3: or you have can a bigger portion without the bread on a platter. So what did I get? The platter
column4: of course! Then you can eat it with mac and cheese
column7: and candied jalape√±os - and the meal is instantly off the chain. They give you different sauces
column8: like Memphis style or Carolina style
column9: but it doesn't really need it.
